name: PW Consultancy Services
goal:
I work as a consultant for CollegesWales/ColegauCymru. I coordinate various EC activities related to the various initiatives associated with VET-specifically EQAVET and Cedefop/Refernet activities.
I also act as one of the ECVET Experts for the UK.
euInitiatives:
ColegauCymru / CollegesWales is the national organisation representing all 14 further education (FE) colleges and institutions in Wales.
It acts as the NCPs for ECVET and EQF and the NRP for EQAVET on behalf of the Welsh Government.
